El crédito será invertido en la compra de mercaderías tales como cremas, perfumes, ropa interior, pantalones, camisas, bolsas y ropa en general. Ella posee el sueño de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en: Mrs Milena sells general merchandise. She has three children under her care. Her efforts to get her children ahead are her priority, which was her motivation for this business. She sells from her home and on the street. She started this business out of the need to make an income, as she was looking for a job and could not find one. With a great deal of sacrifice, she had to find a way to improve her conditions. She has had very good results with this business. This loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise such as creams, perfumes, underwear, pants, shirts, purses and general clothing items. Her dream is to improve her home.

loans.use: to purchase creams, perfumes, underwear, pants, shirts, purses and general clothing items.

loans.name: Saragoza

texts.es: Saragoza tiene 43 años, es una mujer campechana y trabajadora, vive en su propia morada junto a su pareja Sabino de 49 años y sus 03 querido hijos; Ely, Roly y Dina, de 19, 16 y 14 años respectivamente,  lo que más desea es brindarle una buena educación a sus hijos, para lo cual está dispuesta a trabajar arduamente. Los verdes campos del centro poblado Triboline, ubicado en la selva tropical del departamento de Ayacucho, han sido en la vida de Saragoza un lugar muy agradable para trabajar. Desde muy pequeña sus padres le enseñaron esta labor y ahora ella tiene sus propias tierras en las que trabaja con mucho esmero y sacrificio, sus cultivos de cacao, café y frutos de plátano, poseyendo en total 03hectareas de terreno. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio situado en la ciudad de Sivia, Con el crédito solicitado comprará materiales para refaccionar su vivienda. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras para luego heredarlos a sus queridos hijos. Este será su 14avo crédito de Saragoza y esta muy contenta de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de todos ustedes para seguir prosperando. En su banco comunal es una socia cooperadora. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará materiales de construcción para refaccionar su vivienda.
texts.en: Saragoza, 43, is a good-natured and hardworking woman.  She lives in her own home with her partner Sabino, 49, and their 3 beloved children: Ely, Roly and Dina, who are 19, 16 and 14 years old, respectively.  What she wants most is to provide her children with a good education, and to do this she is prepared to work arduously.  In Saragoza's life, the green fields of the village of Triboline, located in the rainforest in the department of Ayacucho, have been a very agreeable place to work.  Ever since she was very young her parents taught her this work, and now she has her own fields where she works with a lot of care and sacrifice.  Her cocoa, coffee and banana crops are grown over a total of 3 hectares of her land.  What she likes most about her work is harvesting the fields, since in this way she feels that the months of hard work are compensated by her quality crops.  She has been farming for 20 years, and what she considers most difficult is transporting her crops from her community to the collection centers located in the city of Sivia.  With the loan she requests, she will buy materials to do some work on her house.  Over time she hopes to save enough money to buy new lands so that later her beloved children can inherit them.  This will be Saragoza's 14th loan, and she is very pleased to know that she can count one more time on the support of all of you so that she can continue to prosper.  In her communal bank, she is a cooperative member.  With the 1,000 Peruvian soles requested, she will buy construction materials to do some repairs on her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for her house

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth tiene ya más de un año dedicándose a la venta de calzado por medio de catálogo.  
Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertir en compra de mercancía de zapatos para mujer, hombres y niño, ya que tiene varios pedidos y no ha podido solicitar el calzado, ya que no quiere descapitalizar el negocio. Vende su mercancía con familiares, amigos, vecinas y también a vender a diferentes partes de la ciudad. 
Porque es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia. 
Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene pagará el crédito.
texts.en:
Elizabeth has been engaging in selling shoes through catalogues for more than one year.
The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of shoes for women, men and children: she has various pending requests, but she could not request other shoes, because she did not want to decapitalize her activity. She sells her merchandise to family, friends, neighbors and also in different parts of the city. This is the source of income for her family.
She will repay the loan with a part of the income she will make.

loans.use: to invest in shoe sales from catalogues.

loans.name: Henry B.'s Group

texts.en:
These eight teachers work in a primary school located in Bafodia village, near the township of Kabala, northern Sierra Leone. This school was founded in 1987 to improve education in the community. Teachers of this noble institution have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, to seek a loan. 

This is the first loan that the teachers of this school have received from SMT/Kiva lenders. The group has requested for a loan of SLL 7,200,000. With the help of this loan, these teachers are in a better position to buy or invest in something that their salary cannot let them do.

Henry is the leader of the group. He is 63 years old and was born in Kambalia. Henry is married and has eight children. He has requested for this loan in order to pay school fees for his children and to buy household furniture.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children and to buy household furniture.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, tiene 33 años de edad, convive con Artemio de 29 años y fruto de su amorío concibieron una hija llamada Jimena de 08 años a quien desean implantarle una educación justa para que  en un futuro próximo sea persona de bien. Julia es una mujer con muchas responsabilidades que cumplir, por ello se despierta  muy temprano para dirigirse a su centro de trabajo y abrir las puertas de su negocio en espera de sus primeros consumidores. Desde hace 05 años viene dedicándose a la de venta de productos de primera necesidad, tales como arroz, azúcar, fideos, detergentes, conservas, entre otros. Se siente muy contento en su puesto de trabajo, por que gracias a su puesto de ventas, adquirió varios mobiliarios para su vivienda y con ello también sustenta los gastos de educación de su querido hijo. Su  puesto de ventas se sitúa en la ciudad de Santa Rosa y es muy concurrido por su clienta. Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado, podrá comprar una congeladora para preservar mejor sus productos embutidos. Espera contar con el apoyo financiero para poder prestar un buen servicio a sus consumidores exigentes. Este será su quinto crédito y necesita el apoyo de ustedes para llevar a cabo su propósito, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por ser parte de su banco comunal. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará una congeladora y con ello conservar mejor sus productos.
texts.en: Julia, a native of the city of Santa Rosa, is 33 years old.  She lives with Artemio, 29, and their 8 year-old daughter, who is named Jimena.  They want her to have a proper education so that in the near future she will be a good person.  Julia is a woman with a lot of obligations to fulfill, and so she gets up very early to go to her work location and open the doors of her business, awaiting her first customers.  She has been selling basic consumer goods such as rice, sugar, noodles, detergents, preserves and other items for 5 years.  She feels very content in her work stall, because thanks to the sales from her stall she was able to acquire furniture for her house and also pay for the education for her beloved child.  Her sales stall is located in the city of Santa Rosa, and receives a lot of customers.  With the support from this loan that she has requested, she will be able to buy a freezer to better preserve her meat products.  She hopes to have the support of this loan so that she can provide good service to her demanding customers.  This will be her 5th loan, and she needs the support of all of you to carry out her objective.  She promises to comply with the payment terms in a punctual manner, and she is grateful to be a member of her communal bank.  With the money she requests, she will buy a freezer to better preserve her products.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Kambeng Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Kambeng est créé le même jour que le Banc Villageois. Ses membres 09 membres qui le composent habitent le même quartier et ont pour activité principale le commerce. 

Mme Gnima, à droite de la photo avec la main droite levée, est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 45 ans. Elle est veuve et mère de 07 enfants à charge.

Elle pratique le commerce de poissons frais depuis plus de 10 ans avec une grande expérience.

Ce prêt lui permettra de faire plus de bénéfice qu'avant et elle pourra renforcer son épargne. 

Les profits lui permettront d'assurer la prise en charge de ses enfants pour la nourriture, la santé et aussi la scolarité.
texts.en:
Le groupe Kambeng est créé le même jour que le Banc Villageois. Ses membres 09 membres qui le composent habitent le même quartier et ont pour activité principale le commerce. 

Mme Gnima, à droite de la photo avec la main droite levée, est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 45 ans. Elle est veuve et mère de 07 enfants à charge.

Elle pratique le commerce de poissons frais depuis plus de 10 ans avec une grande expérience.

Ce prêt lui permettra de faire plus de bénéfice qu'avant et elle pourra renforcer son épargne. 

Les profits lui permettront d'assurer la prise en charge de ses enfants pour la nourriture, la santé et aussi la scolarité.

loans.use: Acheter des caisses de poissons frais

loans.name: Maria Yessenia

texts.es: Yesenia de 25 años es madre soltera tiene un hijo de 8 años inicio su negocio hace 5 años vendiendo ropa para dama cabaleros y miños y gracias a la ayuda de su familia que le han apopyado mucho y tambien a sus clientes que se han incrementado considerablemente,y gracias a eso sus ventas a subido, por eso ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa en bariedad. y surtir sus ventas,el sueño de ella es darle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
texts.en: Yesenia, age 25, is a single mother with one 8-year-old child. She started her business five years ago, selling clothing for women, men and children. Thanks to the help of her family, who have supported her greatly, and to her customer base, which has grown considerably, her sales have increased. For this reason, she is requesting this loan for the purchase of a variety of clothing. This will increase her sales. Her dream is to give her child a better future.

loans.use: to purchase varied clothing.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
El señor Jaime tiene ya más de cinco años dedicándose a la venta de muebles usados.
Está solicitando un préstamo para invertir en un nuevo negocio que es de venta y reparación de llanas para carro y así tendrá mayor ganancia para su familia ya que la venta de neumáticos es más productiva. 
Don Jaime planea pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtendrá con el nuevo negocio, ya que con la venta de los muebles pagara los gastos familiares y escolares de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jaime has been engaged in selling used furniture for more than five years.
He is requesting a loan to invest it in starting a new activity: selling and repairing car tires. This way he will earn extra money for his family, because tire sale is more profitable.
Jaime plans on repaying the loan with the earnings he will obtain from his new activity, while with the furniture sale activity he will pay for family expenses and for the education expenses of his children.

loans.use: To invest it in starting a car tires sale activity.

loans.name: Feliciana Maria

texts.es: Feliciana tiene 23 años de edad, es  madre de una pequeña de 3 años. Ella nos cuenta que  se  dedica a la venta ambulatoria de comida rápida (frituras) como alitas de pollo, hamburguesas, salchipapas,  llevando el ejemplo de su madre quien también se dedicaba a dicha actividad, desde muy joven ella empezó vendiendo frutas en los carros que pasaban por la carretera central poco a poco ha podido surgir, en la actualidad cuenta con un carrito sanguchero que con el  fruto de su esfuerzo pudo comprarse. Feliciana a su corta edad ha tenido que luchar mucho en la vida ya que es madre soltera, y tiene una pequeña que depende de ella. El deseo de Feliciana es de construir su vivienda.  Con el préstamo solicitado ella piensa comprar insumos para su negocio como pollo, hog dog, papa, aceite. Feliciana da las gracias a los prestamistas KIVA.
texts.en: Feliciana, 23, is the mother of a 3-year old daughter.  She tells us that she works as a street vendor, selling fast food--chicken wings, hamburgers, hot dogs--work that she learned from her mother who also sold fast food for a living.  She started working when she was just a girl, selling fruit to passing drivers on the highway.  She has her own food cart now, something that she's had to work hard to save for.  Feliciana has had to struggle at a young age because she's a single mother and has a young child who depends on her.  Her greatest wish is to build a house of her own.  She will use this loan to buy supplies for her business: chicken, hot dogs, potatoes, cooking oil, etc.  Feliciana is grateful to KIVA lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food business.

loans.name: Duo Fuente De Vida Group

texts.es: Clara D. 47 años casada y tiene un hijo ella nos cuenta que se dedica al venta D. ropa tipica la cual tiene ya barios años D. dedicarse a esta actividad ella es la presidenta del grupo y dice que se siente que muy contenta porque le a hido bien en su negocio esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. ropa tipica ya que nececita mas capital D. trabajo y D. la misma manera incrementar sus ventas el sueño D. ella es tener un negocio mas granD. y mejorar sus ingresos y D. la misma manera darle un mejor futuro a su hijo.al igual que la siguente socia se dedica a la venta D. ropa tipica y esta solicitando este credito para compra D. ropa tipica para la venta.
texts.en: Clara, age 47, is married and has one child. She tells us that she sells traditional clothing, and has done this for several years. She is the group president and says that she feels very happy because her business is going well. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of traditional clothing, since she needs more working capital. This will increase her sales. Her dream is to have a bigger business, and to improve her income, thus giving her child a better future. The second group member also sells traditional clothing and is requesting a loan for the purchase of traditional clothing for sale.

loans.use: to purchase traditional clothing for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, and cereals, among other products that raise her sales and grow her business.

loans.name: José Guadalupe

texts.es:
El señor José Guadalupe tiene ya más de ocho años dedicándose a la venta de abarrotes. 
Al negocio le está haciendo falta mas variedad de mercancía, como son la venta de lácteos, carnes frías, verduras y fruta, ya que sus clientes le están solicitando que tenga estos productos para a la venta. 
Solicita el préstamo para la inversión, para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y sigan consumiendo los productos que el vende. 
Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas pagara el crédito, ya que le negocio es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia y así poder darles los estudios necesario a sus hijos para que tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Mr. José Guadalupe has been selling groceries for 8 years.
He needs to offer a larger variety of merchandise such as dairy, cold cuts, vegetables, and fruits since that is what his clients are asking him to sell. 
He is requesting the loan to invest in more merchandise to satisfy his clients needs and they continue buying his products. He will use a portion of his profits to pay off his loan. Since his business provides the family's entire income he will be able to use the rest of the profits to offer his children the education needed for them to have a brighter future.

loans.use: buy merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Mayra Del Rosario

texts.es: Mayra del Rosario: de 25 años de edad ella se dedica a la crianza de animales como pollos y cerdos, desde hace ya barios años,ella mos comenta que es una actividad que le gustan mucho los animales, es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de animales,para crianza y para que cuando ya esta buenos para venderlos los vende, para sacarles su ganacia, el sueño de ella es que sus hijos tengan un futuro de muchas oportunidades,y que sean unos profecionales.
texts.en: Mayra del Rosario, 25, has been raising animals such as chickens and pigs for several years.  She enjoys her work because she likes animals very much and is requesting a loan to buy more to raise and sell for profit.  Her dream is to give her children an education so they will have a better opportunity to become professionals.

loans.use: To buy farm animals.

loans.name: Silvia Maria

texts.es: Silvia Maria su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más 23 años que tiene este negocio. Ella está muy contenta por eso recurre a su crédito, con el cual comprará mercancías variada a un mayor volumen, que le permita obtener descuentos y ofrecerle buenos precios a sus clientes para seguir posicionándose en el sector. Silvia se siente muy agradecida por vivir todos los días y tener un trabajo que le ayude a sufragar los gastos del hogar. Con el crédito comprara sabanas, ropa en general, calzado y cosméticos.
texts.en: Silvia Maria has been selling general merchandise for 23 years.  She is happy to be able to use the loan to buy greater volumes of varied merchandise, at discount cost, so she can offer better prices to customers.  This will help her gain a better market position within her sector.  Silvia gives thanks each day just for being alive and having a job that allows her to cover household expenses.  With the loan she plans to buy sheets, general clothing, shoes and cosmetics.

loans.use: To buy sheets, clothing, shoes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es:
El señor Hilario tiene ya doce años dedicándose a la venta de frutas y verduras. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertir en comprar más variedad de mercancía como son especies, fruta y verduras de temporada.
Planea pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas de su mercancía. 
Don Hilario vende sus productos en diferentes partes de la cuidad el trae sus mercancía del sur de país. Donde puede encontrar los que sus clientes le solicitan. 
Desea tener mas inversión en su negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
texts.en:
Hilario has been engaging in selling fruits and vegetables for 12 years.
The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more variety of products such as spices, season fruit and season vegetables.
He plans to repay the loan with the income he will earn by selling his products.
Hilario sells his products in different areas of the town. He buys his products in the south of the country, where he can find what his customers request.
He wants to invest more in his activity, as this is his source of income to provide for his family.

loans.use: To invest in his activirty by purchasing season fruit, spices and season vegetables.

loans.name: Jorge Rolando

texts.es:
Jorge Rolando tiene 21 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Jorge se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es comprar un casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte y ayudar en lo que se pueda a los vecinos.
texts.en:
Jorge Rolando, 21, is married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank EL DIVINO NIÑO is located in the Estero Lindo community which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops, such as corn and rice.

Jorge also grows corn and rice.  He buys his supplies in Comercial AGRIPAC and sells his produce in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

With the loan he plans to buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizer.  The loan helps him economically to meet his needs.  He is up against challenges such as crop plagues and lack of money to hire more workers.  His dream is to buy a house.

He enjoys sports and helping out neighbors when he can.

loans.use: To buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 32 years old married woman, mother of four children. She has worked in an international call center since 2009. She provides people with international phone calls, since it’s cheaper to do it from her office. Mariam works hard to improve her business in order to help her husband in increasing their income and covering their expenses. 

Mariam has requested a loan, from Al Majmoua-Kiva partner, in order to buy a juice and fruit cocktail refrigerator. She believes the refrigerator is necessary in her center to benefit from the waiting customer’s needs, since most of her customers wait their turn to make their calls. This refrigerator is an additional source of income that will help in increasing their income and improving their social and financial situation.

loans.use: to buy a new juice and cocktail refrigerator.

loans.name: Loboudou 2 Cheikh Sadibou Ndiaye Group

texts.fr:
Le premier groupe de solidarité est créé le 7 juillet 2011 jour de l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de Loboudou 2, il est constitué de trente sept femmes qui sont parentes et ont comme activité dominante l'embouche bovine et ovine.


La responsable madame Altiné Sadibou est âgée de 40 ans, mariée, mère de quatre enfants, elle mène une activité de petit commerce et a une bonne expérience. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en boubou khartoum noir-mauve avec un salut militaire de la main gauche.


Elle achéte ses marchandises ( tissus,parfums, chaussures....) au niveau du marché hebdomadaire de la communauté rurale et revend dans son village.


Elle envisage avec son prêt acheter une bonne quantité de marchandises afin de se faire beaucoup de revenus.


Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices attendus constituer une bonne épargne, son mari assure la prise en charge totale des dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Le premier groupe de solidarité est créé le 7 juillet 2011 jour de l'inauguration du Banc Villageois de Loboudou 2, il est constitué de trente sept femmes qui sont parentes et ont comme activité dominante l'embouche bovine et ovine.


La responsable madame Altiné Sadibou est âgée de 40 ans, mariée, mère de quatre enfants, elle mène une activité de petit commerce et a une bonne expérience. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en boubou khartoum noir-mauve avec un salut militaire de la main gauche.


Elle achéte ses marchandises ( tissus,parfums, chaussures....) au niveau du marché hebdomadaire de la communauté rurale et revend dans son village.


Elle envisage avec son prêt acheter une bonne quantité de marchandises afin de se faire beaucoup de revenus.


Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices attendus constituer une bonne épargne, son mari assure la prise en charge totale des dépenses de la famille.

loans.use: Acheter diverses marchandises destinées à la vente

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis Alfredo tiene 39 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con tres hijos de 13, 10 y 9 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es prosperar economicamente y comprar una finca.

Le gusta hacer deporte y ayudar en la casa.
texts.en:
Luis Alfredo, 39, is married and lives with his wife and three children, ages 13, 10 and 9, in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank EL DIVINO NIÑO is located in the Estero Lindo community which belongs to the Ventanas Canton. This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops, such as corn and rice.

Luis also grows corn and rice. He buys his supplies in Comercial AGRIPAC and sells his produce in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

With the loan he plans to buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizer. The loan helps him economically to meet his needs. He is up against challenges such as crop plagues and lack of money to hire more workers. His dream is to get ahead economically and buy a farm.

He enjoys sports and helping out at home.

loans.use: To buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Las Delicias Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS DELICIAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Delicia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de abarrotes, venta de comida, chofer, compra y venta de artefactos, venta de ropa interior.

La señora Delicia  indica que hace seis años que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando a la  institución por intermedio de vecinas y amigas de su barrio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda que viene trabajando hace 18 años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de fideo, arroz, azúcar y aceite), las que comprarán de la ceja de El Alto y lo comercializará en su tienda. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The lending group "Las Delicias" will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Santiago II. The group is made up of 8 members and is directed by a board whose head is Delicia. The association members' businesses are varied and include: grocery store, food sales, driver, buying and selling artifacts, underwear sales.

Delicia has worked with Pro Mujer for 6 years, becoming involved with the institution through her neighbors and friends. Currently she has a store where she has been working for 18 years.

The loan that she will take out is to increase her capital by purchasing noodles, rice, sugar and oil, which she will buy in La Ceja, El Alto and will sell in her store. This work allows her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. She is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she enjoys the trainings.

loans.use: to buy noodles, rice, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Segundo Cristobal

texts.es:
Segundo Cristobal tiene 37 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con el hijo de 3 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es comprar una finca y una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte y cainar.
texts.en:
Segundo Cristobal, 37, is married and lives with his wife and 3-year-old son in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank EL DIVINO NIÑO is located in the Estero Lindo community which belongs to the Ventanas Canton. This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops, such as corn and rice.

Segundo also grows corn and rice. He buys his supplies in Comercial AGRIPAC and sells his produce in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

With the loan he plans to buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizer. The loan helps him economically to meet his needs. He is up against challenges such as crop plagues and lack of money to hire more workers. His dream is to buy a farm and a house.

He enjoys sports and going for walks.

loans.use: To buy corn and rice seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Bertha Patricia

texts.es:
Bertha Patricia tiene 30 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con dos hijos de 8 años y 3 meses, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Bertha se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es tener capital para comprar una casa y estabilidad economica.

Le gusta cuidar a los hijos y conversar con el esposo.
texts.en:
Bertha Patricia is 30 years old.  She is married and lives with her two husband and two children, ages 8 years and 3 months, in the canton of Ventanas, province of Los Ríos.  

The El Niño Divino (the Divine Child) Rural Communal Bank is located in the Estero Lindo precinct, which belongs to the canton of Ventanas.  The members are farmers who cultivate short-cycle crops such as corn and rice.

Bertha makes her living in agriculture and cultivates corn and rice.  She buys her supplies from AGRIPAC (a company that engages in the import, distribution, and sale of agro-industry inputs in Ecuador) and sells her produce at the Ventanas wholesale market.

She is requesting this loan to plant corn and rice and to buy seeds and fertilizer for the corn and rice.  The support of this loan would help her financially to buy the supplies she needs.  She faces challenges such as crop pests and the lack of money to pay more workers.  Her dream is to have the capital to buy a house and to have financial stability.  

She enjoys taking care of her children and talking with her husband.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for corn and rice.

loans.name: Younis

texts.en:
Younis is a 41 year old married man, father of four children, who has been working raising bees since 5 years ago. He used to be a soldier, but he is retired now. Younis loves his business a lot, and enjoys raising bees a lot. He states that dealing and treating the bees in a kind way is sufficient enough to get the best honey, and the best relationship with them. 

Younis is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua, in order to buy necessary tools to increase his business. Younis works hard on improving his business, and hopes this loan will be with a positive impact. 

Younis, through his increasing business income, will continue building his house. He hopes to stay upon his customers needs, and satisfy their desires.

loans.use: to buy necessary tools to increase his business.

loans.name: Llauquen Group

texts.es:
Este banco comunal se llama “Llauquen”, está conformado por 17 emprendedores que se desempeñan en los rubros de preparación de comida costumbrista, venta de ropa y perfumes. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Castro. 
Nilda quien es la presidenta del banco comunal y que en la foto se encuentra de pie en el primer lugar de izquierda a derecha. Se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida costumbrista de la zona del sur de Chile. Entre estas preparaciones se encuentran el milcao, chuchoca, empanadas, pan casero y el curanto. Se desempeña en este rubro desde hace 14 años, ocupa su casa para la preparación de esta comida, para esto cuenta con una cocina a gas, a leña, fuentes, peroles (Recipiente de metal en forma de media esfera y generalmente con dos asas que se usa para cocinar ) y ollas. Comenta que su horario es totalmente flexible y que la temporada de más alta demanda es durante el verano, ya que se realizan muchas fiestas costumbristas y ferias. Sus ingredientes los compra generalmente en supermercados, donde los precios sean más económicos. 
Con el crédito comprará gas, papas, harina y una maquina extendedora de masa.
Sus metas son expandir su negocio y construir un quincho para ofrecer sus comidas en el mismo lugar para que sus clientes consuman directamente el producto. Ya que Nilda se dedica al Reitimiento consiste en la matanza y posterior cocción de un chancho (cerdo) y otros alimentos en un caldero para obtener manteca.
Nilda vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 19 y 17 años de edad, quienes le ayudan a promocionar sus comidas y atraer nuevos clientes. Uno de sus sueños es que uno de sus hijos termine de estudiar, ya que así podrá optar a mejores trabajos. Además le gustaría viajar dentro del país para conocer algunos lugares. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios otorgados por Fondo Esperanza, debido a que puede contar con un capital que le permita invertir en su negocio. Además disfruta con mucha alegría y cariño las reuniones del banco comunal, ya que el grupo es muy unido y solidario. 
Castro es capital de la isla de Chiloé (la isla más grande de América del Sur), en la región de Los Lagos, zona sur austral de Chile. Su paisaje natural se conserva casi en su totalidad sin intervención del hombre. Además posee una cultura de gran riqueza mítica y costumbrista. Uno de sus grandes atractivos son sus Palafitos, edificaciones (casas) construidas sobre pilotes de madera en la ribera, sobre el mar.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Llauquen" and is comprised of 17 entrepreneurs who are active in traditional food making activities and clothing and perfume sales.  All of them are from the city of Castro.

Nilda is the president of the communal bank and is the first one standing on the left.  She makes and sells traditional food in southern Chile.  Among her products are milcao, chuchoca, meat pies, home-made bread and curanto.  She has been in this business for 14 years and runs it out of her home.  She has a gas stove, firewood, serving trays, and metal pots.  Her workday is flexible and the summer season is when her foods are in highet demand because of the local festivities and fairs.  She buys ingredients at the supermarkets where prices are lower.  With the loan she will buy gas, potatoes, flour and a dough stretching machine.

Her goals are to expand her business and build a stand where her customers can enjoy the food directly.  Nilda makes lard out of pork that she butchers locally and mixes with other foodstuffs.

Nilda lives with her husband and her two children, ages 19 and 17, who help her market her food and attract customers.  One of her dreams is to see her children finish their education so they can get a better job.  She also wants to travel around the country and visit different locations.

She is very happy and grateful for the services she receives through the Fondo Esperanza, since this allows her to have the necessary capital to invest in her business.  She also enjoys the cheerfulness and affection at the meetings at the communal bank, since the group is very united and supportive.

Castro is the capital of the island of Chiloé (the largest in South America), in the region of Los Lagos, in Chile's austral south area.  Its natural landscape is almost totally preserved from human intervention.  It also has a richly mythical, traditional culture.  One of the great attractions are the houses called Palafitos which are built on wooden stilts out over the sea.

loans.use: To buy gas, potatoes, flour and a dough stretching machine.

loans.name: Elia

texts.es:
La señora Elia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora originaria de Diriomo, Granada. Ella se dedica al comercio de ropa y cosméticos desde hace 5 años negocio que inicio con la ayuda de su esposo y el cual con los créditos ha ido mejorando.
Este es su cuarto crédito en Adim y con el comprara camisas, pantalones, blusas, faldas…etc.
texts.en: Mrs. Elia is a hard-working entrepreneur from Diriomo, Granada.  She has been selling clothing and cosmetics for five years.  She started up her business with her husband's help, and has continued improving it thanks to loans.  This, her fourth loan through Adim, will be used to buy shirts, trousers, blouses, skirts, etc.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as shirts, trousers, blouses, skirts, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria tiene 32 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos solteros tiene cuatro hijos,vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Estero Lindo, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es comprar una finca.

Le gusta cocinar y hacer quesos.
texts.en:
Maria is 32 years. She is married and lives with her spouse and unmarried children. She has four children and she lives in the Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. 

The "EL DIVINO NIÑO" communal bank is located in the grounds of Estero Lindo in the Ventanas canton. The members of this group work in short-cycle farming such as sowing corn and rice.

María is a farmer who grows corn and rice. She buys her supplies from AGRIPAC and sells them in the Ventanas wholesale market.

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy seeds and fertilizers for corn and rice, and  then sow them. With the support of this loan, she would have the financial help needed to provide for her basic needs. She faces challenges such as crop pests and a lack of money to pay more workers. Her dream is to buy a farm.

She likes cooking and making cheese.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for corn and rice.

loans.name: Erlinda Elizabeth

texts.es: Erlinda, una joven de 26 años de edad, nació en la ciudad de León, esta casada, es madre de un niño de un año de edad, ella es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de calzado en el mercado de la ciudad de León ,lleva 7 años en este negocio. Ella inicio en este negocio a los 18 años con ayuda de sus padres desde entonces hasta hoy en día este ha sido su único negocio y medio de subsistencia, su esposo ayuda en el hogar con el salario que el gana. Ella solicito el préstamo para comprar zapatos e invertir en su negocio, pues su anhelo mas grandes es poder expandirse y ofrecer variedad y estilos de zapatos, pues le seria de gran ayuda ya que podrá crecer su negocio , introducir productos nuevos en su tienda ,hacer nuevos clientes y mejorar sus ingresos. Su próxima meta es expandirse un poco mas ofreciendo mejores productos de calidad.
texts.en:
Erlinda, 26, was born in the city of León.  She is married and has a one-year-old son.  Her business is selling shoes in the market in the city of León, where she has been active for seven years.  She began her business when she was 18 with the help of her parents and since then this has been her only source of income.  Her husband uses his salary to help with household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy shoes and invest in her business because she wants to expand and offer a wider variety and different styles of shoes.  This would help her introduce new products at her store, attract more customers and increase her income.  Her goal for the future is to expand a little more and offer better quality products.

loans.use: To buy shoes and invest in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
La señora Luz, de 43 años de edad, es originaria de Larreynaga una comarca ubicada en Malpaisillo municipio de León  pero desde hace 20 años vive en la ciudad de León, esta casada, es madre de tres hijos, de oficio comerciante, ella es dueña de una pulpería. Ella inicio en este negocio hace 20 años con un pequeño capital que su esposo le dio, ella recuerda que tan solo tenia una mesa y poco productos que vender pero gracias a sus esfuerzos y deseos de salir adelante su negocio fue prosperando poco a poco . Hoy en día ella tiene 5 vitrinas,5 estantes de madera, venta ropa y mercadería en general, su esposo la sigue apoyando pues el aporta con salario que gana como trabajador en la alcaldía municipal ,su hijo menos la ayuda atender el negocio después de clases.
Requiere el préstamo para comprar granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite productos de consumo diario e invertir en compra de mercadería de ropa para mujer, varón y niños. Ella dice que al surtir su negocio con más productos podrá atraer nuevos clientes y hacer crecer su negocio. En sus planes futuros ella quiere compra unos estantes de aluminio, un freezer, maniquíes con la ganancia ir mejorando su casa poco a poco.
texts.en:
Mrs. Luz, 43, is originally from Larreynaga, a county in Malpaisillo, in the municipality of León.  For 20 years she has lived in the city of León.  She is married, the mother of three children and is the owner of a grocery store.  She started up her business 20 years ago with a little capital that her husband gave her.  She remembers that she only had a table and a few products to sell but thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, business gradually became prosperous.  She now has five display cases and five wooden shelves.  She sells clothing and general items.  Her husband continues to give his support by contributing the salary her earns as an employee of the town hall.  Her youngest son helps out with the business after school.

She needs the loan to buy basic food items such as rice, beans, sugar, oil and other daily consumption items.  She also wants to buy women's, men's and children's clothing.  By adding more stock she will be able to attract more customers and increase business.  In the future she would like to add aluminum shelving, a freezer, and mannequins.  With her earnings she plans to carry out home improvements little by litte.

loans.use: To buy basic foods such as rice, beans, sugar, and oil; and merchandise such as women's, men's and children's clothing.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa Maria: D. 26 años D. edad y tiene 4 hijos ella se dedica a la venta D. animales para crianza como pollos y cerdos, ella nos cuenta que se dedica a esta actividad desD. ya hace varios años, ella dice que Gracias a Dios ella a tenido la oportunidad D. mantener su negocio y que dia a dia ba creciendo por eso ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. animales, tales como cerdos, pollos. ella espera que fape le pueda dar la oportunidad D. el credito ya que es la forma conque ella pueD. aumentar sus ventas.y D. la misma forma darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Rosa Maria: she is 26 and has 4 children. She sells animals for raising, such as chickens and hogs. She tells us that she has done this work for several years. She says that, thanks to God, she has had the opportunity to maintain her business and that it is growing day by day. For this reason she is requesting a loan for the purchase of animals, such as hogs and chickens. She hopes that FAPE will be able to give her the opportunity to have this loan, since it will allow her to increase her sales and give her children a better future.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and hogs for raising.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: Rosa, de 36 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de León, esta casada, es madre de dos hijos, ella anteriormente trabajaba como domestica pero después con ayuda de su esposo decidió poner su propio negocio y puso un local de alquiler de video juegos el cual esta  en su casa de habitación  además su esposo la ayuda con lo que el gana en su trabajo lleva con este negocio tres años. Requiere el préstamo para comprar dos televisores y dos controles que necesita. Le será de gran ayuda pues podrá ofrecer un mejor servicios a sus clientes, ella sea comprar mas  activos como sillas, televisores, controles, video juegos , hacerle mejoras de infraestructura a su local, prosperar como mujer de negocios buscando ganarse la vida honradamente y mejorando su calidad de vida para ella y su familia
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old and lives in the city of León.  She is married and the mother of two children.  She used to work as a domestic employeee but, with the help of her husband, she decided to start her own business and so set up a spot in her own home renting video games.  She has been in this business for three years and her husband helps her with what he earns in his work.

Rosa needs this loan to buy two television sets and two controllers.  This will be very helpful as she will be able to offer a better service to her customers.  She would like to buy more assets for her business such as chairs, television sets, controllers and video games, and make some structural improvements to her premises.  She would like to prosper as a businesswoman, earning an honest living, and improve her own quality of life as well as that of her family.

loans.use: to buy two television sets and two controllers that she needs

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en:
Claudine is a 23 year old Rwandan entrepreneur. Her husband works as a tailor and she has 2 children, 1 and 4 years old. Her elder son is in school. 

For the past 8 years, Claudine has been running a shop where she sells clothes, shoes, and kerosene. The profits from her successful business have allowed her to buy a piece of land.

She will use this loan to purchase more goods to sell in her store so that she can continue to make profits. She hopes to earn enough profits so that she can begin construction on her family house.

loans.use: to purchase goods for sale such as clothes, shoes, etc.

loans.name: Amigas Unidas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMIGAS UNIDAS” iniciará su décimo segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Santiago II, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Lucila. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de refrescos, venta de maíz, joyeria, venta de comida, tienda, taller de chaperia, venta de papa.

La señora Lucila  indica que hace cuatro años que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando a la  institución por intermedio de vecinas y amigas de su barrio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de maíz que aprendio de su mamá.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de maíz), los que comprara de Zorata y lo comercializará en la calle. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank "AMIGAS UNIDAS" will begin its tenth loan cycle through Pro Mujer at the Centro Santiago II.  The group is comprised of nine members and has a board of directors chaired by Mrs. Lucila.  The business activities of the members are varied and include: sales of softdrinks, corn, jewelry, food, potatoes, a sheetmetal workshop and a store.

Mrs. Lucila has been working with Pro Mujer for four years and joined the institution through neighbors and friends in her neighborhood.  She currently sells corn, which is a trade she learned from her mother.

The loan she is taking out will be used to increase her capital to buy corn in Zorata and sell in the street.  This activity generates income to help support her family as much as possible.  She is married and has three children.

When asked what she enjoys most about Pro Mujer, she says the training and health-related activities.

loans.use: To buy corn.

loans.name: Yobana

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Yobana y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 30 años edad, tengo un hijo y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es ser ama de casa”. 

Yobana es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que con la ayuda de su esposo que es técnico en farmacia sacan adelante a sus hijos.   Ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para la alimentación, educación y vestimenta de su hijo. El sueño Yobana es abrir una cadena de boticas.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital city of the province of La Convención.  The valleys of Lares and La Convención are important commercial centers, with the main activities being coca plant, coffee, cocoa and fruit production.

In Quillabamba, we visited the communal bank "Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan" where we met Yobana, who told us:

"I was born in the city of Quillabamba, am 30 years old, have a son and live in the same city where I was born.  I am a homemaker."

Yobana is a hard-working, enterprising woman who provides for her children with the help of her husband who is a pharmacy technician.  She is in need of a loan for personal use to provide food, clothing and education for her son.  Yobana's dream is to open a chain of general stores.

loans.use: To provide food, clothing and education for her son.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia, tiene 53 años D. edad, es viuda, vive con su madre, quien depenD. económicamente D. ella, Lucia se dedica a la venta D. tortillas desD. hace 8 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra D. maíz y leña, estos materiales son muy necesarios para la preparación D. sus tortillas, ya que al disponer D. ellos en mayor cantidad su producción será mejor.
Su aspiración que a través del negocio pueda mantenerse tanto ella como  su madre, teniendo salud para poder permanecer en el negocio.
texts.en:
Lucia is 53 years old and widowed.  She lives with her mother who is financially dependent on her.  Lucia has been selling tortillas for eight years.  She is currently requesting a loan to buy corn and firewood.  These materials are essential for making her tortillas.  If she has a larger quantity of them available, her production will improve.

Lucia's aspiration is to be able to support herself and her mother through her business.  She hopes to enjoy good health so that she can keep working in her business.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood

loans.name: Yonis Alberto

texts.es:
Yonis es un joven de 24 años de edad, casado, aun no es padre, el trabaja en una tienda de vendedor, a si mismo su esposa, el tiene cinco años laborando en la tienda, pues es un joven de poco recursos economico el cual quiere progresar al tener mejores condiciones de vivienda. Tambien ha trabajado en construccion y ha salido adelante bajo las circuntancias economica de su familia.
actualmente su casa es de madera, en donde ha pasado dificultades de sol y agua, ahora que esta casado le impulsa superarse para ambos y con apoyo de su pareja, quieren construir su cuarto de concreto.
el no cuenta con el capital suficiente, para comenzar, pero atravez de Afodenic, se le hara posible la compra de materiales de construccion en piedra, bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, clavos, tabla. Para comenzar su cuarto. Esta sastifecho por esta mejora que comenzara y que le dara mejores condiciones de higiene y seguridad.
texts.en:
Yonis is a young man of 24.  He is married but is not a father yet.  He works as a shop assistant in a store, as does his wife.  He has been working in the store for five years.  Yonis is a young man with limited financial means who would like to make progress and improve the condition of his home.  He has also worked in construction and has gotten ahead in life despite the financial circumstances of his family.

Currently, Yonis' home is made from wood and he has experienced problems with sun and water.  Now that he is married, he would like to do better for both himself and his wife.  With the support of his wife, he would like to build a room from concrete.

Yonis does not have the capital he needs to start this work but, through Afodenic, he will be able to buy construction supplies (stone, blocks, sand, cement, iron, nails and planks) and start building his room.  He is happy that he will be able to start making this improvement as it will provide him with better hygiene and safety.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to start building a room

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.en:
Clotilde is a 27 year old Rwandan entrepreneur. She is married and has 2 children between the ages of 4 months and 4 years. Neither of her children are in school and her husband owns a bar.

For the past 12 years, Clotilde has been running a general store in which she sells cooking oil, salt, sugar, rice, and other goods. Her store is doing well and she will use this loan to purchase more goods to meet the demands of her customers and to continue to earn profits. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business. She dreams of someday having a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy items such as cooking oil, salt, etc.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Dora y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 49 años edad, soy viuda, tengo tres hijos y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es ser cocinera”. 

Dora es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora a pesar de las adversidades saca adelante a sus hijos, ella trabaja en la casa de un pariente cocinando. Ya es un año que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para pagar la movilidad de su casa al lugar donde trabaja, ella gasta S/. 4,00 nuevos soles diarios. El sueño de la socia es abrir un restaurante.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital of La Convención province and an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main business activities here are coca, coffee, cacao and fruit production.

In the town of Quillabamba, we visit the "Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan" community bank and meet Dora who tells us:

"I was born in the town of Quillabamba.  I am 49 years old and a widow.  I have three children and live in the town where I was born.  My main business activity is working as a cook".

Dora is a tenacious and entrepreneurial woman who, in spite of life's adversities, is managing to get her children ahead in life.  She works in a relative's home cooking.  She has been in this business for one year and it is doing very well.  On this occasion, she needs a loan for personal use.  She will pay the transportation costs between her home and the place where she works.  She spends 4 Peruvian soles a day on this.  Dora's dream is to open a restaurant.

loans.use: to pay her transportation costs between home and work

loans.name: Solidario Manantial De Vida Group

texts.es: Solidario Manantial de vida: este grupo esta conformado por tres señoras las cuales una de ellas es la presidenta quen es Clediberta,quien es la presidenta del grupo ella se dedica a la confeccion de tejidos tipicos tales como guipiles,cortes,y fajas. ella nos cuenta que se siente muy contenta porque fape atravez de los credito le a apoyado mucho y gracias a eso a podido salir adelante,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la comfeccion de tejidos,al igual que las otras socias tambien esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos,
texts.en: Solidario Manantial de Vida: This group is made up of three women. The president is Clediberta, who makes traditional woven items such as huipiles [traditional tunics], skirts, and sashes. She tells us that she is very happy because FAPE has supported her greatly through her loans. Thanks to this, she has been able to get ahead. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of basic material for making woven goods. The other members are also requesting this loan for the purchase of basic material for making woven goods.

loans.use: to purchase basic materials for weaving.

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Eulogio y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 52 años edad, soy madre soltera,  tengo dos hijos y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es la agricultura”. 

Eulogia es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora a pesar de las adversidades saca adelante a sus hijos, ella trabaja cultivando café, cacao, yuca, maíz, achote y plátanos. Desde muy joven se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mejoramiento de los terrenos de cultivos.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital of La Convención province.  It is an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main business activities here are coca, coffee, cacao and fruit production.

In the town of Quillabamba, we visit the "Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” community bank and meet Eulogia who tells us:

“I was born in the town of Quillabamba.  I am 52 years old and single.  I have two children and live in the town in which I was born.  My main business activity is farming".

Eulogia is a tenacious and entrepreneurial woman who, in spite of life's adversities, is managing to get her children ahead in life.  She works farming coffee, cacao, cassava, corn, annatto and bananas.  She has been in this business since she was very young and it is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to improve her farmland.

loans.use: to improve her farmland

loans.name: Maria's Communal Bank Group

texts.en:
Maria Gregoria is the president of this communal bank comprised of six women and one man. The members of the communal bank live and work near the city of Ambato in the central Ecuadorian Andes. 

Maria Gregoria is 32 years old and married. She lives with her husband and their two sons, aged eight and six years. She is a dedicated and collaborative person. Maria Gregoria buys and raises cattle. She began her business three years ago when she bought a calf. Afterwards, she invested in a milk cow. She currently works with her husband. 

This loan is Maria Gregoria’s first and she will invest the money in a new cow. She hopes that this loan will improve the income for her family. Maria Gregoria’s goal for the future is that her family will be able to continue the business and expand it to include selling milk and cheese. 

All of the women in the photo and the man in the red hat are the borrowers. The additional men are the husbands of some of the women.

loans.use: to purchase a new cow.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Luzmila y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 50 años edad, es casada, tengo cuatro hijos de las cuales dos son independientes y dos todavía están a mi lado y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es ser ama de casa”. 

Luzmila es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora a pesar de las adversidades saca adelante a sus hijos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal para la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital of La Convención province.  It is an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main business activities here are coca, coffee, cacao and fruit production.

In the town of Quillabamba, we visit the "Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” community bank and meet Luzmila who tells us:

“I was born in the town of Quillabamba.  I am 50 years old, married, and have four children.  Two of my children live independently and the other two are still by my side.  I live in the city in which I was born and my main business activity is being a housewife".

Luzmila is a tenacious and entrepreneurial woman who, in spite of life's adversities, manages to get her children ahead in life.  On this occasion, she needs a loan for personal use.  She will use the money to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to pay for her children's education

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
La señora Ofelia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien inicio en Adim con el grupo  Rayito y Esperanza. En la actualidad ella ha graduado a los créditos individuales con el fin de seguir mejorando su negocio.
Ofelia se dedica al comercio de ropa usada (camisas, pantalones…etc.) y semanal vende aproximadamente 3,000. Esta señora madre de cinco niños con el crédito comprara pacas de ropa para seguir aumentando su negocio.
texts.en:
Ofelia is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who started working with ADIM as a member of the "Rayito and Esperanza" group.  She has now moved on to taking individual loans in order to continue improving her business.

Ofelia sells used clothes (shirts, pants, etc.) and sells approximately 3,000 cordobas worth each week.  This lady is the mother of five children and she will use her loan to buy a bundle of clothes so that she can continue increasing her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes (shirts, jeans, pants, etc.)

loans.name: Dora Delia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dora; la socia tiene 30 años; la socia es soltera;  La socia se dedica a la docencia, la socia es docente de profesión y trabaja en el colegio Pachacutec, que está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo, la socia aún no piensa en tener hijos pero si le gustaría en un par de años, la socia disfruta de el poder enseñar a sus alumnos y también de orientarlos para que sean jóvenes íntegros y educados, la socia suele sacar el préstamo para invertir en la compra de diferentes artefactos, como televisores, licuadoras, cocina, entre otros ya que esta independizándose de la casa de sus padres para lo cual ella desea poder invertir en sus cosas personales como muebles y otros, en esta ocasión la socia desea el crédito para comprar un mueble de dormitorio el cual ira pagando poco a poco con su sueldo de docente. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un mueble de dormitorio.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Dora is a member of the “SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA” community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Dora is 30 years old and single.  She is a teacher by profession and works in Pachacutec school which is located in San Jerónimo district.  She still not planning on having children just yet but she would like to in a couple of years.  Dora enjoys teaching her students and also guiding them so that they become upright and educated young people.  She usually takes out loans to invest in buying household items such as a television set, a blender, a stove, etc. as she is becoming independent from her parents and their home and would like to be able to invest in personal items such as furniture, etc.  On this occasion, she would like a loan to invest in buying a piece of bedroom furniture.

Dora is very happy and grateful for the the support that she is receiving.  She pledges to make her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy a piece of bedroom furniture

loans.name: Los Emprendedores De La Libertad Group

texts.es:
LOS EMPRENDEDORES DE L. LIBERTAD, es un grupo que trabaja con EDAPROSPO desde hace 4 meses, sus integrantes son personas dedicadas a actividades de comercio.
Desiret es L. actual secretaria del grupo, tiene 21 años y espera un hijo; para llevar el sustento a su hogar trabaja en una juguería y además se dedica a L. preparación de queques, chocolates para venderlos a sus vecinos.
ElL. nos cuenta que trabajo en una empresa en L. cual le obsequiaron una beca para estudiar Gastronomía de año y medio, el cual fue una oportunidad que agradece mucho y el cual le ha permitido dar clases en una escueL..
Su mayor anhelo es poner una juguería en L. cual pueda ofrecer sus productos y que le permita mejorar su economía y calidad de vida.
El préstamo solicitado será invertido en L. compra de insumos para preparar masa elástica.
texts.en:
'Los Emprendedores de L. Libertad' is a group that has been working with EDAPROSPO for four months.  The group's members are people who work in commerce.

Desiret is the group's current secretary.  She is 21 years old and expecting a baby.  In order to provide for her household, she works in a juice bar and also makes cakes and chocolates which she sells to her neighbors.

Desiret tells us that she worked for a company who gave her a grant to study cookery for eighteen months.  This was an opportunity for which she was very grateful and it has allowed her to give classes in a school.

Desiret's biggest wish is to set up a juice bar where she can sell her products and improve her finances and quality of life.

Desiret will use the loan she has requested to invest in buying supplies for preparing 'masa elástica' (fondant cake covering).

loans.use: to buy supplies for making 'masa elástica' (fondant cake covering)

loans.name: Delphine

texts.en: Delphine is 22 years and has 3 children, ages 1-6, only one in school. Her husband is a businessman. She owns a general store in which she sells different items such as salt, soap, matches, etc. Delphine has done this business for the past 3 years. This business has enabled her to meet the needs of her family. She needs a loan to reinvest in her business. Delphine wishes to have a wholesale store in the future.

loans.use: to buy some items for her shop.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en:
Chantal is a 29 year old Rwanda entrepreneur who is married. She has 3 children between the ages of 6 and 9, all of whom are in school. Her husband works as a motor taxi driver.

For the past 5 months, Chantal has been running a general store in which she sells food items such as Irish potatoes, cassava and maize flour, sunflower oil, and other goods. 

Even though her business is new, it is doing very well and Chantal has already provided herself with enough profits to purchase a cow. She requires a loan so that she can purchase more goods to sell in her store and continue to earn profits.

With the profits, she plans to pay the school fees for her children and to provide for the overall well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell in her store such as cassava, maize flour, etc.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Hilda y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 32 años edad, tengo seis hijos y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es ser ama de casa”. 

Hilda es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que junto con su esposo Elmer que es albañil sacan adelante a sus hijos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal para la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital of La Convención province.  It is an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main business activities here are coca, coffee, cacao and fruit production.

In the town of Quillabamba, we visit the "Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” community bank and meet Hilda who tells us:

“I was born in the town of Quillabamba.  I am 32 years old, have six children, and live in the town where I was born.  My main business activity is being a housewife”. 

Hilda is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who, together with her husband Elmer who is a builder, gets her children ahead in life.  On this occasion, she needs a loan for personal use (to pay for her children's education).

loans.use: to pay for her children's education

loans.name: Maria Reyna

texts.es:
María tiene 62 años D. edad, es casada y vive en el distrito D. Cayalti, un distrito tranquilo D. la provincia D. Chiclayo, Maria vive con hijo, quien la apoya en las labores D. su negocio, su familia es unida y su comunidad se dedicaban al comercio, agricultura y ganadería..

Maria se dedica desD. hace varios años a la compra y venta D. animales. Ella los cría en corrales que se encuentran en la parte posterior D. su domicilio y cuando estos han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes D. la zona y en algunas ocasiones a sus vecinos y pobladores del distrito. 

Ella desea comprar animales para engorD. y alimentarlos con productos balanceados y  poder así mejorar el desarrollo D. sus animales y venderlos a mejor precio. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 3000 nuevos soles.

María es una persona trabajadora y bastante responsable. Las personas que lo conocen la consideran alguien tranquilo y confiable.
texts.en:
María is 62, married, and lives in the Cayalti district, a peaceful district of the province of Chiclayo. Maria lives with her child, who helps her with her business. Her family is united. In her community, residents work in traD., agriculture and livestock.

Maria has bought and sold animals for several years. She raises them in corrals located at the back of her home, and when the animals have reached a good stage of development she offers them for sale to the various businesspeople in the zone. Sometimes she sells to neighbours and the residents of the district.

She wants to purchase animals to fatten, and balanced feed, and thus be able to improve the development of her animals. This will allow her to sell them at a better price. For this reason she has decided to request a loan of 3000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Maria is a hard-working and very responsible person. Those who know her say she is calm and reliable.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and balanced food for said livestock.

loans.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sonia, vive en casa de una Tía, tiene dos hijos de 10 y 15 años de edad, trabaja con el negocio de las pupusas, este negocio lo inicio hace tres años con su madre, se apoyan mucho.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima, pollo, chicharrón, quesillo, aceite, tomates y condimentos, esta inversión le ayudara para aumentar la producción y tener facilidades con el inventario abastecido de todo lo necesario para el negocio.
Su aspiración es mejorar la producción, mantener siempre el número de clientes, velar por las necesidades de sus hijos y mejorar los ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Sonia lives with her aunt and two children, aged 10 and 15.  She manages a shop selling pupusas that she started three years ago with the help of her mother.  Sonia now seeks a credit to buy chicken, chicharrón, cheese, oil, tomatos and condiments, to make pupusas.  This inventory will help her grow her business through increased production, and will allow her to expand her clientele.  She is confident this credit will better allow her to improve her finances and provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken, chicharrón, cheese, oil, tomatos and condiments, to make pupusas.

loans.name: Maria Ignacia

texts.es: La señora María, tiene 64 años de edad, es viuda, tiene 8 hijos, es originaria del sauce municipio de León, es  comerciante vende mercadería en general, lleva 10 años dedicándose a esto. Aprendió este oficio por tradición pues su madre se dedicaba a lo mismo así desde temprana edad apoyo a su mama, también ella tuvo una pulpería la cual mantuvo por 22 años y desde hace 10 años que se dedica a vender ropa, zapatos, perfumes, shampoo, cosméticos. Ella solicita el préstamo para compra mercadería nueva como ropa, zapatos, perfumes para invertir y mantener surtida su tienda, tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes. Doña María dice que uno de sus grandes proyectos que ella quiere realizar es tener una gran tienda de variedades y mercadería en general, componer su casa y seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
María is 64 years old, a widow, and has eight children.  She is from the town of León and sells general merchandise.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  She learned the trade through tradition as her mother was in the same business.  She supported her mom from a very early age.  She also had a grocery store which she ran for 22 years.  Ten years ago she started selling clothes, shoes, perfume, shampoo and cosmetics.

María is requesting this loan to buy new merchandise such as clothes, shoes and perfumes so that she can invest, keep her store stocked and have a greater variety of goods to offer her customers.  María says that one of the large projects she would like to carry out is to open a large store where she will sell general merchandise.  She also plans to make some repairs to her home and continue working.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise such as clothes, shoes and perfumes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods such as maize flour, rice, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: put a ceiling in his home.

loans.name: Maria Genara

texts.es:
Maria Genara tiene 49 años de edad, ella tiene un hijo.  Ella cuenta con casa propia la se encuentra localizada en el caserío El Partidor, distrito de Tambogrande, en su localidad Maria Genara cuenta con el servicio básico de energía eléctrica.

Maria Genara cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ella ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y amigos diversos productos de consumo diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes desde hace 3 años. Este negocio cuenta actualmente con una clientela fija y fidelizada. Gracias a esta actividad ella ha podido mantener a su hijo y sacarlo adelante durante todo este tiempo.

Maria Genara desea ampliar su negocio comprando más mercadería como abarrotes y productos de uso domestico que son los que tienen mayor rotación de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes durante esta temporada, donde se ha podido dar cuenta de la demanda en su negocio y por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Maria Genara tiene deseos de seguir emprendiendo en el crecimiento de su negocio para poder obtener una calidad de vida, razón por la que ella trabaja día a día, ella es una mujer tranquila, y con buenas referencias por parte de las personas que la conocen.
texts.en:
Maria Genara is 49 and has one child. She has her own home located in the hamlet of El Partidor, in the Tambogrande district. Maria Genara has basic electricity services in her home.

Maria Genara has a store in her home. There she has sold various daily staples and groceries to her neighbours and friends for three years. This business now has a fixed and loyal customer base. Thanks to this business, she has been able to take care of her child and get him ahead.

Maria Genara wants to expand her business by buying more merchandise such as groceries and household products, which are the most-purchased items. This will allow her to satisfy her customers' demand for this season. She has been able to identify areas of demand in her business, and for this reason she has decided to request a loan of 1500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Maria Genara wants to continue to pushing forward with her business' growth in order to obtain a good quality of life. This is her reason for working day to day. She is a calm woman with good references from those who know her.
